sourcesContent:
import { useParams, useHistory, NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import popularVerb from "./popularVerb"; import axios from "axios" import seulverb from "./data1" import Helmet from "react-helmet" import dotenv from "dotenv" dotenv.config() function SingleVerb() { const [AllData, setAllData] = useState(seulverb[0]) const [IsData, setIsData] = useState(false) const [inputValue, setinputValue] = useState("") const { singleVerb } = useParams() const history = useHistory() const verbSingleOne = singleVerb.split("-")[2].split(".")[0] const title = `Conjugation ${verbSingleOne} | Conjugate verb ${verbSingleOne} | Simplecyto Conjugator English` const description = `Conjugate the English verb ${verbSingleOne}: indicative, past tense, participle, present perfect, passive, conditional, conjugation models and irregular verbs. Translate ride in context, with examples of use and prononciation.` useEffect(() => { const options = { method: 'GET', url: 'https://linguatools-conjugations.p.rapidapi.com/conjugate/', params: { verb: verbSingleOne }, headers: { 'x-rapidapi-key': "2a50965eebmsh629d096fce14516p1319aejsn22e0ba714d98", 'x-rapidapi-host': 'linguatools-conjugations.p.rapidapi.com' } }; axios.request(options).then(function (response) { if (response.data.result === `Wort ${verbSingleOne} nicht im Lexikon.`) { setAllData(seulverb[0]) setIsData(true) } else { setAllData(response.data) setIsData(false) } }).catch(function (error) { console.error(error); }); }, [verbSingleOne]) function seachVerb(e) { e.preventDefault() history.push(`/conjugation/conjugation-verb-${inputValue}.html`) } return (
{title}
{ setinputValue(e.target.value) }} />
{IsData && Loading... }
{ (!popularVerb.includes(verbSingleOne)) ? <>

Infinitive: to {verbSingleOne}

Simple Past: {verbSingleOne + "ed"}

Past Participle : {verbSingleOne + "ed"}

Indicative

Present Simple

  • I {verbSingleOne} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("I " + verbSingleOne) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • You {verbSingleOne} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("you " + verbSingleOne) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • He/She/It { verbSingleOne.split("").reverse()[0] === "h" ? verbSingleOne + "es" : verbSingleOne + "s" } { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("she " + verbSingleOne + "s") utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • We {verbSingleOne} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("we " + verbSingleOne) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • You {verbSingleOne} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("you" + verbSingleOne) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • They {verbSingleOne} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("they " + verbSingleOne) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
:

} {/* <>

{element.heading.toUpperCase()}

  • {element.forms[0][0]} {element.forms[0][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[0][0] + element.forms[0][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • {element.forms[1][0]} {element.forms[1][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[1][0] + element.forms[1][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • {element.forms[2][0]} {element.forms[2][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("she" + element.forms[2][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • {element.forms[3][0]} {element.forms[3][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[3][0] + element.forms[3][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • {element.forms[4][0]} {element.forms[4][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[4][0] + element.forms[4][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>

) }) }

  • {element.forms[0][0]} {element.forms[0][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[0][0] + element.forms[0][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • {element.forms[1][0]} {element.forms[1][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[1][0] + element.forms[1][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>

) }) }

{element.heading.toUpperCase()}

  • {element.forms[0][0]} {element.forms[0][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[0][0] + element.forms[0][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • {element.forms[1][0]} {element.forms[1][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[1][0] + element.forms[1][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • {element.forms[2][0]} {element.forms[2][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance("she" + element.forms[2][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • {element.forms[3][0]} {element.forms[3][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[3][0] + element.forms[3][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • {element.forms[4][0]} {element.forms[4][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[4][0] + element.forms[4][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
  • {element.forms[5][0]} {element.forms[5][1]} { const utterance = new SpeechSynthesisUtterance(element.forms[5][0] + element.forms[5][1]) utterance.rate = .8 utterance.lang = "us-US" speechSynthesis.speak(utterance) }}>
) }) }
*/}
) } export default SingleVerb
